text:
This was the very first game to ignore the Nintendo of America Guidelines or whatever it was that they had at the time (basically, no religious references on the games, no blood, etc.). The Saint Eva Church, demonic cults - for the first time on a Nintendo game on USA.

And, of course, the game is awesome...

text: The game play is about average for an RPG on  the SNES and has cool concepts like town creation and fusions.  Story is awesome and has a more mature tone to it.  This is my favorite RPGs of all time... well maybe tied with FFX.  I highly recommend this game.
